name: @darlean/examples
description: Examples of using Darlean Virtual Actor Technology

scripts.test: npm run example:oracle:all && npm run example:performance:all
scripts.example:oracle:all: npm run example:oracle:1 && npm run example:oracle:2 && npm run example:oracle:3 && npm run example:oracle:3:reuse && npm run example:oracle:4:cluster1 && npm run example:oracle:4:cluster1:reuse && npm run example:oracle:4:cluster3 && npm run example:oracle:4:cluster3:reuse
scripts.example:oracle:4:cluster1: shx rm -r ./persistence && concurrently --success first "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster1:server" "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster1:client && npm run example:kill"
scripts.example:oracle:4:cluster1:reuse: concurrently --success first "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster1:server" "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster1:client -- --reuse  && npm run example:kill"
scripts.example:oracle:4:cluster3: shx rm -r ./persistence && shx rm -r ./trace && concurrently --success first "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server01" "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server02" "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server03" "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster3:client  && npm run example:kill"
scripts.example:oracle:4:cluster3:reuse: concurrently --success first "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server01" "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server02" "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server03" "npm run example:oracle:4:cluster3:client -- --reuse  && npm run example:kill"
scripts.example:oracle:5: shx rm -r ./persistence && concurrently --success first "npm run example:oracle:5:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server01" "npm run example:oracle:5:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server02" "npm run example:oracle:5:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server03" "npm run example:oracle:5:cluster3:client && npm run example:kill"
scripts.example:oracle:6: shx rm -r ./persistence && concurrently --success first "npm run example:oracle:6:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server01" "npm run example:oracle:6:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server02" "npm run example:oracle:6:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server03" "npm run example:oracle:6:cluster3:client && npm run example:kill"
scripts.example:oracle:7: shx rm -r ./persistence && concurrently --success first "npm run example:oracle:7:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server01" "npm run example:oracle:7:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server02 --darlean-runtime-webgateways-port=8081" "npm run example:oracle:7:cluster3:server -- --darlean-appid=server03 --darlean-runtime-webgateways-port=8082"
scripts.example:performance:all: npm run example:performance:n1 && npm run example:performance:n3
scripts.example:performance:n1: concurrently --success first "node lib/performance/server.js --darlean-config=config/performance/server1.json5 --darlean-appid=server01" "node lib/performance/client.js --darlean-config=config/performance/client1.json5 --darlean-appid=client --servers server01 && npm run example:kill"
scripts.example:performance:n3: concurrently --success first "node lib/performance/server.js  --darlean-config=config/performance/server3.json5 --darlean-appid=server01" "node lib/performance/server.js  --darlean-config=config/performance/server3.json5 --darlean-appid=server02" "node lib/performance/server.js  --darlean-config=config/performance/server3.json5 --darlean-appid=server03" "node lib/performance/client.js  --darlean-config=config/performance/client3.json5 --darlean-appid=client --servers server01,server02,server03 && npm run example:kill"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm test && npm run lint
scripts.preversion: npm run format && npm install && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.precommit: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.doc: npx typedoc --skipErrorChecking --json typedoc-out.json &  npx docgen typedoc-out.json ./docs/

author: Theo van der Donk
